attributes.action: stop the BBC funding the Eurovision contest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC is one of the top 4 funders of the Eurovision song contest. This is a waste of money and at the very least the amount of funding it gives to the the contest should be reduced. The contest votes are politically motivated. The licence fee should not be wasted in this way.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
